song_name: Eternal Wind -Shining Smiles in the Wind-
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Eternal Wind -Shining Smiles in the Wind- is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Eternal Wind -Shining Smiles in the Wind- has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Minor,  and F Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
